channel.title: 317 Help Please
channel.description: When people try to login sometimes they can't login for some reason. It says error connecting, then it says they're iped. Then I would have to restart the server for them to be able to login. Please help me. This is a deltascape base.

item.title: 317 Help Please

item.description:
@xsageofmali wrote:

When people try to login sometimes they can’t login for some reason. It says error connecting, then it says they’re iped. Then I would have to restart the server for them to be able to login. Please help me. This is a deltascape base.
